content.title: Anterior Tibial Artery Entrapment
content.description: Rare entrapment of anterior tibial artery at the level of the interosseous membrane.

clinical_features.mechanism: Compression by fibrous band or anomalous muscle at interosseous membrane
clinical_features.presentation: Anterior leg claudication, especially with exercise

diagnosis.dynamic_testing: Ankle/foot positional maneuvers during duplex or angiography

treatment.surgical: Division of compressing structure, arterial reconstruction if damaged

content.clinical_pearl: Consider when anterior compartment claudication exists with normal popliteal signals
